title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competency: Integrated Lecture and Practical Training for Vaccination Clinic Operations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and general knowledge of pharmacist/healthcare assistant roles
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain administrative procedures of vaccination clinics (patient registration, appointment management, insurance claims, etc.)
Learners can apply role allocation and staff management methods in vaccination clinics through practical simulations
Learners can accurately recall and execute Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for vaccine storage, administration, and disposal at 80% or higher accuracy through mobile learning modules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
